title: Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin wedding photos with guests Kendall and Kylie Jenner
text:
Advertisement

Justin Bieber and Hailey Baldwin said 'I do' on Monday night in an intimate ceremony at the Montage Palmetto Bluffs in South Carolina.

The not-so-newlyweds, who first tied the knot over a year ago, kicked off the night by exchanging vows in a chapel on the property as guests including Kylie and Kendall Jenner, Joan Smalls, Jaden Smith and Leonardo DiCaprio's girlfriend Camilla Morrone looked on.

Baldwin, 22, did everything in her power to keep her wedding look a secret up until the last second, and walked from her suite to the chapel underneath a tent that kept her dress completely hidden.

Once the ceremony was over, she changed into a halter gown for the reception.

Bieber, 25, went traditional, wearing a classic tuxedo with bow tie for the big night.

Scroll down for videos

Baby, baby, bay ooh: Justin Bieber has shared the first images from his wedding to wife Hailey Baldwin on Monday

Like baby, baby, baby ooh: The couple first tied the knot just over a year ago after Justin proposed in the Bahamas while the two were shooting the cover of Vogue

Putting a ring on it: The couple showed off their bands in this black and white snap that Justin shared to Instagram

Bling! Bieber shows off some very flashy grills that he donned for the nuptials as his bride flashes her huge rock

The bling ring: Hailey wore a customized leather jacket to the reception (left) while guests downed bottles of blinged-out champagne (right)

Tenting: The bride used a tent to keep herself hidden while making her way from the suite to the church (above)

Looks: It is still unclear if she changed into the halter gown she was see wearing at the reception of wore the same dress throughout the night

My neck, my back: Hailey was stretched out ahead of the ceremony on Monday, in full hair and makeup

Group play: Justin and Hailey posed in the photobooth with Jaden Smith and music director Alfredo Flores

Security: Justin poses next Lauren Walters (to right) the head of the singer's security and his groomsman on Monday

Leather gear: The bride poses with her friend and stylist Maeve Reilly in an embroidered leather jacket

Justin proposed to Hailey in July 2018 while the pair were in the Bahamas to shoot the cover of Vogue.

Two months later, they privately tied the knot in a New York courthouse.

Now, one year after that very low-key ceremony, the pair reaffirmed their vows in Monday's religious ceremony at the 20,000-acre luxury waterfront resort.

The bride's look remains a secret, but that is not the case for the guests, many of whom posted to social media.

A number of the ladies dazzled in gold, but none more so than Kylie, whose gown had a long slit and deep neckline.

Kendall was far more muted in a velvet gown and crimped hair.

Hailey's post-ceremony hair was tied in a chignon at the nape of her neck with loose tendrils framing her face, while she opted for dewy make-up. Her post-ceremony looks also featured a high cut halterneck and displayed her lithe, toned arms.

All that glitters: Kylie Jenner stole the show on Monday in a stunning gold gown with a high slit and low neckline (left) while Kendall crimped her hair (right)

Ruff ryder: A visibly nervous Oscar Bieber (above) was dressed to impress for the ceremony on Monday

With icing on top: The self-made billionaire also showed off some pricey jewels to go with her golden look

A striking shot of some of the guests at the Biebers' wedding including Kendall Jenner, models Joan Smalls and Riley Montana and Justine Skye

Children: Scooter Braun and Bieber's friend Rory Kramer (on left) and Kylie with daughter Stormi (right)

Kendall Jenner flipped her wedding ring finger at the camera in this photobooth shot

Living it up: Kendall was one of the more social media-heavy stars during the bash as she shared a bevy of snaps

Dapper dans: The groomsman pose for a photograph before the evening's fetsivties get underway on Monday

Ready for anything: Kendall, 23, looked fresh-faced and invigorated as she showed off her green velvet dress

Happy days! Jaden Smith (centered), was among the star-studded guest list to celebrate the Biebers' second wedding (pictured with Kylie and Kendall Jenner)

Someone has to change! Nightclub owner and restaurateur David Grutman helped document the pre-wedding festivities. He shared a set of photos of his wife Isabela Grutman posing with Camila Morrone, only to find out that the two wore nearly identical yellow dresses

Happy couple: Jason Kennedy anmd his wife Lauren Scruggs (above) were among the guests in attendance

Style stars: Kendall with hair stylist Jen Atkin, photographer Mike Rosenthal and makeup artist Mary Phillips

Homeowners at the resort were notified of the event ahead of time, and informed that many areas would be off limits from Sunday afternoon through Tuesday.

They were also told that no guests were allowed to enter the grounds unless management had been notified prior to Sunday.

The newlyweds commanded most of the resort, including: the BBQ restaurant where they hosted their rehearsal dinner; the resort's spa and main pool; and the compound of rooms where wedding guests including Kendall and a few of Hailey's famous uncles and cousins stayed.

Not among the guests was Alec Baldwin, who has been at odds with Hailey's dad Stephen, who does not share his brother's anti-Trump and pro-choice views.

Family matters: The bride's mother and sister (left) before the wedding and the groom's father and stepmother (right) on Sunday

Hold on: World famous singing superstar Chynna Phillips attempts to go incognito in a photo with her daughter Jameson

Baby, baby, baby: The groonm's two younger sinlings Jaxon and Bay pose together before the wedding on Monday

Father of the bride: Stephen Baldwin shakes hands with a fan before going to get ready for the nuptials on Monday (above)

Bieber boys: The groom's father and uncle (on left) and his younger brother Jaxon (on right)

It was not just the champagne bottles adorned with wording but also water bottles with the couple's names emblazoned across.

As with many weddings, there was a photobooth however the Biebers had a unique touch to their own as the photos were modelled like an iMessage on an iPhone.

Proving himself to be a friendly ex, Justin invited his first girlfriend Caitlin Beadles to the event, 11 years after they dated.

She seemed keen on the food as she revealed they were serving gluten-free cornbread which she was determined to take home.

Model mayhem: Riley, Camila, Hailey and Joan pose for a photo while thousands of miles away from Paris Fashion Week

Picture perfect: Justin and Hailey walked down the aisle in a rustic clapboard chapel located in the private village of Montage Palmetto Bluff. The chapel includes large Gothic windows, and the 100-capacity building will seat guests in pews

Here come the boys! Friends of the groom stacked in for an amusing shot where Bieber stuck his tongue out

Wow! As with many weddings, there was a photobooth however the Biebers had a unique touch to their own as the photos were modelled like an iMessage on an iPhone

Black tie: The bride and groom pose for a photo with Fai Khadra (left), seen with girlfriend Riley Montana (right)

The gun show: Guests spent the day target shooting while wearing the custom shirts designed by the couple for their wedding

The festivities kicked off for the couple last week as they celebrated with friends days before the wedding.

Hailey headed out to dinner at Ysibel in Los Angeles with with her sister and maid-of-honor Alaia, Kendall, and Hillsong host Natalie Manuel Lee on Wednesday, and later stopped by Delilah nightclub in West Hollywood.

Justin has been spending time in Laguna Beach with his friends, eschewing the more traditional drinking and partying for skateboarding and painting sneakers.

He and his friends also got tattoos on Thursday night, on the back of their knees.

Blowing out the bride: Hailey has her hair tended to prior to the ceremony on Monday evening (above) in her suite

Drink up! Friend to the stars Fai Khadra posed with the vast bottle of bubbles in a stylish snap

Personalised: One guest shared a photo of 'The Biebers' shirts that were given out while another posted a photo of a boat with a flag covered in hearts that took guests around the area

Happy days: Just before the nuptials, Justin shared a photo of his new watch on Instagram. 'Got my self a lil wedding gift,' Justin wrote in the caption of the photo that was shared just before 6.30pm Monday evening

Kendall posed for photos while holding a glass of wine during a pre-ceremony event.

One of Bieber's close friends, rapper Lil Za, shared a photo of himself alongside his girlfriend, Atifa Barwani.

Aside from Hailey's friend Kendall, other guests include Bieber's fellow pop star Katy Perry, model Joan Smalls and Bieber's manager Scooter Braun.

Just before the nuptials, Justin shared a photo of his new watch on Instagram. 'Got my self a lil wedding gift,' Justin wrote in the caption of the photo that was shared just before 6.30pm Monday evening.

Several of the glamorous ladies in attendance at the Bieber wedding reception. Some of the celebrities included Kendall and Kylie Jenner, as well as Jaden Smith

Group shots: The male guests (left) and their female counterparts (right) posed for group shots later in the evening

Happier times: Justin took to social media to share a snap, writing 'Mom and dad'

Justin took to social media to share a snap of two of the guests before playfully penning: 'Mom and Dad Cuteee'.

A source told DailyMail.com that the reception took place in the Montage's ballroom – a short walk from the chapel.

The ballroom was decked out by Los Angeles-based events company Revelry Event Designers, which supplies décor for the Oscars and the Grammys, as well as bespoke events.

Never say never: Proving himself to be a friendly ex, Justin invited his first girlfriend Caitlin Beadles to the event, 11 years after they dated

Classy: The two also posed in a stately library in front of a portrait-bearing mantle

Supporting players: The wedding wouldn't have been complete without some of the people who helped Justin and Hailey look and feel their best. Dr. Jocelyne posed in the photo booth with the hair stylist Florido and makeup artist Denika Bedrossian

The 'newly' weds: Justin also celebrated with some of his pals by snapping a goofy photo booth shot after the ceremony. Hailey showed off her lovely smile in another photo booth shot with David Grutman and his wife Isabela Grutman

Rock on: The rapper and son of Will Smith flashed a grill while the crowd snapped mirror selfies while Bieber's close friends, rapper Lil Za posed for a stunning selfie

Zooming around: Another Snapchat featured him and other guests driving around the massive estate on a multi-row golf cart

According to reports, the ceremony was conducted by Justin's pastor Judah Smith, while Hailey's sister Alaia Baldwin and cousin Ireland Baldwin were her bridesmaids.

A source told E! News the "guests [were] cheering" after the pair exchanged their vows.

Guests had been served cocktails before the wedding and trays of champagne were on hand as they left the ceremony to head across to a reception in the Wilson Ballroom for dinner.

It was claimed on Sunday, the couple gathered their loved ones together for a pre-wedding sleepover, where they hosted a screening of their favourite movie The Notebook.

As well as the film, Justin and Hailey, hosted fun and games at their carnival themed pre party, and put on a whole spread of ice cream and candy, along with a giant dance party, bowling, and a big game of capture the flag.

Sources say the party lasted into the night, and at around 1am, the couple surprised everyone with water guns to start a huge water fight. Meanwhile, other sources recently said the couple "aren't nervous" about their big day.

An insider said: 'They aren't nervous. They are so comfortable and have never been more sure about anything...

'It's really just a celebration of their love in front of family and friends. They've been waiting for this day for a long time, and they are just excited it's finally here. They are both very relaxed and not stressed at all.'

Justin Bieber invited FIRST GIRLFRIEND Caitlin Beadles and her brother to his wedding (and she couldn't stop raving about the food) Rehearsal: Caitlin, 25, shared a photo of her and Christian, 22, to her Instagram Story on Sunday, from what appeared to be the rehearsal dinner of Justin Bieber's wedding ByBrian Gallagher For Dailymail.com Justin Bieber is still on good terms with his first girlfriend, Caitlin Beadles, inviting her and her brother Christian to his wedding in South Carolina. Caitlin, 25, shared a photo of her and Christian, 22, to her Instagram Story on Sunday, from what appeared to be the rehearsal dinner. She also raved about the 'gluten free cornbread' at the dinner, stating she was taking some, 'to go.' Caitlin was wearing a pink lace dress with a silver bracelet for the rehearsal dinner, with a small gold necklace around her neck. Her brother Christian, a popular YouTube comedian and singer, also posted two photos wearing the same outfit from his sister's Instagram story snap, stating it's, 'wedding szn.' Christian was wearing a white Drew House shirt under a navy blue suit coat with tan pants and shoes as he held a cocktail. Christian also shared a photo of some Drew House merchandise, Bieber's clothing company, which was apparently provided for wedding guests. He also shared a candid photo of him wearing his tuxedo, presumably after the wedding festivities had ended, or were winding down. His sister Caitlin hasn't posted any photos to her Instagram or her Instagram Story of the actual wedding ceremony. Cornbread: She also raved about the 'gluten free cornbread' at the dinner, stating she was taking some, 'to go' Tux time: He also shared a candid photo of him wearing his tuxedo, presumably after the wedding festivities had ended, or were winding down Caitlin Beadles was Justin Bieber's first girlfriend, having met when the singer moved to Atlanta after being signed by Usher and Scooter Braun's label. The pair met in 2008, when Bieber was just 14, and dated for about a year, until Beadles reportedly ended the relationship after Bieber's fame grew exponentially. Bieber's song Never Let You Go off his album My World 2.0 is reportedly inspired by Beadles, according to an E! report on Bieber's dating history. Bieber remained close friends with both Christina and Christian throughout the years, and he event spent Thanksgiving with the Beadles family in 2017. 'So thankful for my brother and sister this thanksgiving,' Christian wrote in an Instagram post, with the hashtags #happyturkeyday and #family.

Happy days: The couple looked sharp as they dressed up for their rehearsal dinner. Hailey donned a pair of statement Jimmy Choo's with her white mini dress

Idyllic: The couple picked this luxurious wooden chapel that sits inside a private village, surrounded by rolling green fields, and located beside the scenic May River

A vision: Guests shared these photos as they left the ceremony and headed to the post-ceremony cocktail hour
description: The couple looked the image of happiness in the shot, as they locked lips before cosying up and looking overjoyed to be up close and personal.
